com.google.appinventor.client

Class Ode

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.client.Ode
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntryPoint

    public class Ode
extends Object
implements EntryPoint
    Main entry point for Ode. Defines the startup UI elements in onModuleLoad().

      • setTopToolbar

        public void setTopToolbar(TopToolbar toolbar)
        Set the location of the topToolBar. Called from TopPanel(). We need a way to find it because the blockly code needs to interact with the Connect-To dropdown when a connection to a companion terminates.
